skills.name: Whirling Lashes
skills.desc: This character performs "<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prepare Skill" for <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Whirling Lashes: First Strike and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Whirling Lashes: Fixed Pattern separately.

skills.name: Ominous Spirit Unleashed (Hydro)
skills.desc: (Passive) <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After this character takes DMG: If this character has no more than 7 HP, they gain 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Energy and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Spirit of Omen's Awakening: Hydro is attached. (Once per Match)
